dcterms:description: A large collection of synthetic images for semantic segmentation of urban scenes, used to evaluate the performance of semantic segmentation algorithms in automated driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: SYNTHIA-CVPR’16

T. Kim
A. Humayun

dcterms:description: A dataset for video segmentation that tracks many figure-ground segments, providing consecutive frames for evaluation of segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: SegTrack V2

dcterms:creator: J. Pont-Tuset

dcterms:description: A dataset for video object segmentation, used in the 2017 DAVIS challenge, providing high-quality annotations for evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: DAVIS

dcterms:creator: M. Heimberger
J. Horgan
C. Hughes

dcterms:description: A popular automotive dataset used for evaluating computer vision algorithms in automated driving scenarios, providing real-world driving data.
dcterms:title: KITTI
